attributes.action: taxing of foreign vehicles on uk roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe all foreign vehicles on uk roads should pay a daily taxation charge similar to our europeon neighbours.As with when we take our vehicles abroad we are bound to pay tolls or tax depending on the country. Benefits to uk road tax payers could be a reduction in cost of our road tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
